mapper.select: SELECT SUM(material_total) AS total FROM quality_monitoring_realtime_data1 WHERE YEARWEEK( date_format(produce_date, '%Y-%m-%d'), 1 ) = YEARWEEK(now(), 1) UNION ALL SELECT SUM(material_total) AS total FROM quality_monitoring_realtime_data2 WHERE YEARWEEK( date_format(produce_date, '%Y-%m-%d'), 1 ) = YEARWEEK(now(), 1);

SELECT SUM(material_total) AS total FROM quality_monitoring_realtime_data1 WHERE DATE_FORMAT(produce_date, '%Y%m') = DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y%m') UNION ALL SELECT SUM(material_total) AS total FROM quality_monitoring_realtime_data2 WHERE DATE_FORMAT(produce_date, '%Y%m') = DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y%m');

SELECT CAST(SUM(material_total)/1000 AS CHAR) AS total FROM `quality_monitoring_realtime_data1` WHERE YEAR (produce_date) = YEAR (NOW()) UNION ALL SELECT CAST(SUM(material_total)/1000 AS CHAR) AS total FROM `quality_monitoring_realtime_data2` WHERE YEAR (produce_date) = YEAR (NOW())
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(produce_date,'%Y-%m-%d') AS firstDate FROM quality_monitoring_realtime_data1 ORDER BY produce_date LIMIT 1

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(T1.produce_date,'%d') AS proDate, SUM(T1.total) AS total FROM (SELECT produce_date, ROUND(SUM(material_total)/1000) AS total FROM quality_monitoring_realtime_data1 WHERE PERIOD_DIFF( date_format(now(), '%Y%m'), date_format(produce_date, '%Y%m') ) = 0 GROUP BY produce_date UNION ALL SELECT produce_date, ROUND(SUM(material_total)/1000) AS total FROM quality_monitoring_realtime_data2 WHERE PERIOD_DIFF( date_format(now(), '%Y%m'), date_format(produce_date, '%Y%m') ) = 0 GROUP BY produce_date) AS T1 GROUP BY T1.produce_date order by T1.produce_date

SELECT CAST(SUM(T1.sumCount) AS CHAR) AS counts, CAST(SUM(total) AS CHAR) AS totals FROM ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS sumCount, SUM(material_total) AS total FROM quality_monitoring_realtime_data1 WHERE date_format(produce_date, '%Y %m') = date_format( DATE_SUB(curdate(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH), '%Y %m' ) UNION ALL SELECT COUNT(*) AS sumCount, SUM(material_total) AS total FROM quality_monitoring_realtime_data2 WHERE date_format(produce_date, '%Y %m') = date_format( DATE_SUB(curdate(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH), '%Y %m' ) ) AS T1

SELECT CAST(SUM(T1.sumCount) AS CHAR) AS counts, CAST(SUM(total) AS CHAR) AS totals FROM ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS sumCount, SUM(material_total) AS total FROM quality_monitoring_realtime_data1 WHERE date_format(produce_date, '%Y %m') = date_format( DATE_SUB(curdate(), INTERVAL 2 MONTH), '%Y %m' ) UNION ALL SELECT COUNT(*) AS sumCount, SUM(material_total) AS total FROM quality_monitoring_realtime_data2 WHERE date_format(produce_date, '%Y %m') = date_format( DATE_SUB(curdate(), INTERVAL 2 MONTH), '%Y %m' ) ) AS T1

SELECT SUM(T1.`value`) AS `value`, CONCAT(T1.`name`,'月') AS `name` FROM (SELECT ROUND(SUM(material_total)/1000 )AS `value`, MONTH(produce_date) AS `name` FROM quality_monitoring_realtime_data1 WHERE DATE_FORMAT(produce_date, '%y') = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%y') GROUP BY MONTH(produce_date) UNION ALL SELECT ROUND(SUM(material_total)/1000 )AS `value`, MONTH(produce_date) AS `name` FROM quality_monitoring_realtime_data2 WHERE DATE_FORMAT(produce_date, '%y') = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%y') GROUP BY MONTH(produce_date)) AS T1 GROUP BY T1.`name`

SELECT COUNT(*) AS totals, CONCAT(MONTH(T1.produce_date),'月') AS dates FROM ( SELECT produce_date FROM quality_monitoring_realtime_data1 WHERE DATE_FORMAT(produce_date, '%y') = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%y') GROUP BY produce_date UNION ALL SELECT produce_date FROM quality_monitoring_realtime_data2 WHERE DATE_FORMAT(produce_date, '%y') = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%y') GROUP BY produce_date ) AS T1 GROUP BY MONTH(T1.produce_date)

SELECT CAST( SUM(T1.total) / 1000000 AS CHAR ) AS total FROM ( SELECT SUM(material_total) AS total FROM `quality_monitoring_realtime_data1` WHERE YEAR (produce_date) = YEAR (NOW()) UNION ALL SELECT SUM(material_total) AS total FROM `quality_monitoring_realtime_data2` WHERE YEAR (produce_date) = YEAR (NOW()) ) AS T1
